plugin.name: caps
plugin.description: Global options for the CAPS plugin

parameter.name: maxTimeDiff
parameter.description: The maxmimum time difference with respect to current time of the end time of a received record. If exceeded then the end time will not be logged into the state file.

parameter.name: inOrder
parameter.description: Request all records in-order. Out-of-order records will be skipped.

binding.name: caps
binding.description: Transfers data from CAPS to SeedLink server

parameter.name: address
parameter.description: CAPS URL to fetch data from, format: [[caps|capss]://][user:pass@]host[:port]

parameter.name: streams
parameter.description: Comma separated list of streams. Stream format is [LOC.CHA]. Streams may contain wildcards

parameter.name: proc
parameter.description: Name of the proc object (defined in streams.xml); used for processing raw streams (streams submitted by a plugin as raw samples).
